overview:
Zack is an entrepreneur and student in Boulder, Colorado. He is the founder of Deliverss, a stealthy startup that focuses on personally prioritized content.

In April 2010, Zack founded 59thirty, an iPhone and iPad development company. To date 59thirty has released two apps: My Reading List for iPad and Beeline RTD for iPhone.

Zack is an advocate of youth entrepreneurship and non-traditional education. Zack fundamentally believes that some of the best learning can be done far outside of the classroom through the application of knowledge, not test taking. He has spoken on this subject at Ignite Boulder, the largest Ignite talk in the world. He also blogs about it regularly on TheStartupStudent.com.
